channel.title: Clear Eye Productions
channel.description:
I'm making a broadcast team for my school. Every morning they play the TV with a PowerPoint thing. They have A-Way Productions.. I have Clear Eye Productions (© ;)), so heres the logo I made for it. I'm planning on having quite a few computer savvy video editors on the team. And Not with MovieMaker, or PowerPoint, something more professional like Flash Pro 8 & Adobe PhotoShop CS2.. and Adobe After Effects.. I spelled the whole programs out cuz it makes it look cooler :P
[img]http://img87.imageshack.us/img87/6077/eyecomplete01fj7.jpg[/img]

We’ll be doing out first video in a few weeks, planning on doing a good one, so were gonna spend our time on it

item.title: Clear Eye Productions
item.dc:creator: @Suede Suede
item.description:
@Suede wrote:

Hmm, The text doesn’t fit in, no offence mate, but it might fit better on top, or in the corner, since the eye isn’t really at the middle of the pic the text looks like its not supposed to be there… Just my opinion

Still 8/10!

At first i was stunned, and i scrolled down to see the text, and like, whoa, not as good as i had thought.

…THE EYE IS JUST TOO GOD DAMN NICE!..

Read full topic
